scripts.build: npm run install:deps && npm run build:all && npm run verify
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:prod: npm run install:prod && npm run build:all && npm run verify
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:deps && echo 'All dependencies installed successfully'
scripts.install:deps: cd server && npm install --no-audit && cd ../client && npm install --no-audit
scripts.install:prod: cd server && npm install --omit=dev --no-audit && cd ../client && npm install --no-audit
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/node_modules client/node_modules node_modules server/dist client/dist
scripts.audit:fix: cd server && npm audit fix && cd ../client && npm audit fix
